Title: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) for Nipoppy
Leaders: Brent McPherson Michelle Wang Mathieu Dugre Nikhil Bhagwat Jean-Baptiste Poline
Project Description:
• We are building a model context protocol (MCP) for Nipoppy.
  • This will allow for Agents to seamlessly access and query Nipoppy datasets.
Goals for Brainhack Montreal: We hope to design a basic prototype of a MCP for querying a Nipoppy dataset. The goal is to begin designing the API for searching the dataset and have a deployable service for a dataset to deploy to use the service.
What will participants learn?: You will learn about how Nipoppy works internally with tracking data and analyses as well as the basics of MCP.
Data to use: We'll generate local examples of valid datasets to work with.
